Package birdgame

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • birdgame.GamePiece
      • birdgame.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Player
extends GamePiece
implements java.io.Serializable
    Player class contains all the attributes and methods related to the bird (user).
    Author:
    crnis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Player()
